explanation: [0-0] A young man with blond hair, wearing a red T-shirt and black shorts, stands in an outdoor area with metal stands, facing a blue trash can. He has a smile on his face and holds a pizza box in his hand. Behind him are green trees, and at the top of the screen is a white caption: "Throwing away pizza boxes in Germany".

[0-6] The man smiles and opens the trash can lid with his right hand, then his expression turns serious. The camera focuses on the pizza box as the man opens it, revealing pizza scraps and grease stains inside. He looks up into the distance and slowly closes the pizza box in his hand.

[32-41] At this point, the camera turns to the other side of the room, where a man in a gray hoodie and a black baseball cap walks in and looks in surprise at the man in the red T-shirt sitting on the sofa dealing with the pizza box pieces. Then, the camera focuses on a pair of feet in gray slippers, which slowly move upwards. The man in the gray hoodie stares in stunned silence as the man in the red T-shirt gradually levitates. The man in the gray hoodie stands at the door, watching this scene in shock. Finally, the man in the red T-shirt rises to the roof, surrounded by light. A black frame appears at the top of the screen showing a green trophy and the white text: "Achievement unlocked Mülltrennung Meister".
